text: Hi Elise, you’re right in that you can’t currently set a fallback color for a background image on a section or a row using the editor - you bring up an interesting point and I’m going to forward this feedback along to the product team.

When you say CTA forms do you mean pop-up forms? We haven’t been working on this within the new markup at the moment, we’re working on getting this out to embedded forms next, but we will be visiting this within the future.
